Text: Thank you very much for this torrent - I've been waiting for one that does not crash my computer.  Looking forward to the rest of this season.  Thank you again.
Can we expect the other discs soon? Thanks!

This is Cool Thanks 
is this the re-issue / replacement without sound problems ?

CAPRIKA: No, this is not the re-issue. What you're thinking of was a set that contained the entire first season (not just the first 5 episodes), was in 1080p instead of 720p, and had different (blue) packaging.
I am hoping that you will do the other discs soon.  I am unable to reproduce the quality of your upload with either of my compression programs.  Again thank you for this.
